attributes.action: Any child sex/ abuse related cases to serve a life sentence
attributes.additional_details: Any literally any cases related to child sex or abuse to serve a minimum of 20+ years
attributes.background: To ensure any child sex/ abuse cases are taken far more seriously I’m sick of seeing predators getting away with jail time

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory Life Sentence For Child Sex Offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589160

Increase sentences for abuse, neglect and murder of a child: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602482
